mapper.select:
select count(*) from Schedule s left join StartURL u on s.startURLId = u.id
u.siteId like CONCAT('%','${match}','%' )
and u.startURL like CONCAT('%','${url}','%' )
and u.name like CONCAT('%','${channelName}','%' )
and u.jobname like CONCAT('%','${jobname}','%' )
and s.locationId =#{locationId}
and s.scheduleType=#{type}

select
from Schedule s left join StartURL u on s.startURLId = u.id where s.startURLId = #{startURLId}
select * from Schedule s where s.locationId = #{locationId}

select
from Schedule s left join StartURL u on s.startURLId = u.id where s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into Schedule (startURLId, jobId, schedule, locationId,scheduleType, status, createTime) values (#{startURLId},#{jobId},#{schedule},#{locationId},#{scheduleType},#{status},#{createTime})
